name: Dungeon Voxel
description:
.

Dungeon Voxel is a rogue-like, dungeon crawler game where you try to survive in dungeons filled with fearsome enemies. You will have to destroy the enemies to reach the chests that await you in the dungeons. The chests are filled with dazzlingly bright gold, rubies and emeralds. You must collect power-ups that will help you survive in the dungeons and destroy your enemies with dozens of different weapons. The bosses will be waiting for you at the end of each floor to defeat you. Collect your weapons, strengthen your character and clear the dungeon rooms from enemies.


Dungeons: These are the places that put you in trouble with terrible enemies and traps when light gradually decreases. Defeating the boss may give you great rewards. Dungeons are recreated in each run and they become more and more difficult, do your best and use your ammo carefully!



Guns: The guns that you get from the chests in dungeons or which you can by from gun dealer will help you to beat enemies. Take what you want from dozens of weapons and defend yourself against enemies! Weapons that use lasers, fireballs, acid, plasma, grenades and more as bullets are waiting for you in the game. If you find a rare chicken that throws eggs, be careful when you use it.



Pets: The most important feature that strengthens you in the game is the pets that you can find in dungeons and at the dealer. Each pet has its own and unique strengthening. Pets can increase your weapon damage, provide you with a shield, slow down enemies for you, and even deal damage. By collecting a few of the same pet, you can increase their level and strengthen them. Prepare to build yourself an army that will fight for you and strengthen you.

Skills: The game has character-specific skills that our character can use, and these features will help you defeat enemies during battle.


Buffs and Debuffs: Another thing you can find in the game from sellers and dungeon rooms is buffs, but you have to be careful when buying them! Buffs can sometimes bring with it features that weaken you.
